    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Constants
    A utility class that defines constants used in encounters within the Dungeon Game.
    DisplayManager
    Handles the display of game-related information, including the current room, the player's location on the map, and their inventory.
    DungeonMap
    Manages the dungeon map and its levels in the Dungeon Game.
    DungeonMap.LevelFactory
    Inner class responsible for creating the layouts of each dungeon level.
    EncounterManager
     
    EncounterManager.EncounterState
    Inner class to manage the state of encounters, including their locations and whether they have been encountered.
    Encounters
    Manages specific encounters in the Dungeon Game, including Mad Scientists, Traps, Lost Explorer, and The Guardian.
    Encounters.GuardianEncounterManager
    Manages the Guardian encounter in Level 3 of the Dungeon Game.
    Encounters.LostExplorerEncounterManager
    Manages the Lost Explorer encounter in the Dungeon Game.
    GameUtils
    Utility class for common game-related operations, such as printing with delay, clearing the console, and displaying headers.
    InventoryManager
    Manages the player's inventory, including adding, removing, and using items.
    InventoryManager.RelicManager
    An inner class that handles logic related to the Relic, a unique item in the game.
    LevelTransitionHandler
    Handles transitions between dungeon levels and manages level-related game states.
    LostExplorerEncounterTest
    A manual test class for simulating the Lost Explorer encounter in the Dungeon Game.
    Main
     
    Main.GameLoop
    Inner class responsible for running the main game loop.
    MovementLogic
    Handles player movement within the dungeon.
    PlayerDataHolder
    Holds the player's data, including name, power points, current room, and inventory.
    PositionDataHolder
    Manages the player's position within the dungeon.
    PotionActions
    Handles the effects of potions in the Dungeon Game.
    PowerPointManager
    Manages the player's power points, including adding and deducting points.
    SearchActions
    Handles player search actions in the dungeon, allowing players to look around and discover items or interact with their environment.
    SQLiteConnection
    Utility class for managing SQLite database connections.
    TeleportationActions
    Handles teleportation actions in the Dungeon Game, allowing the player to move to a random location on the map.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing user data in the SQLite database.
